hotels.title: Contemporary Bali Beach Escape Overlooking Renowned Surf Break
hotels.description: Discover absolute serenity at Hotel Komune and Beach Club Bali located on one of the worldâ€™s premier surf breaks on the island's east coast. Savour a delicious meal alongside fresh ocean breezes at the open-air Health Hub restaurant, take a break at the indulgent spa or escape the heat with a refreshing dip in the pool. Later, explore the volcanic beachfront, reinvigorate your mind, body and soul in the yoga pavilions or follow the winding paths to the mighty Keramas surf breaks.
